Posts.Content: Mar 19, 2018 09:59PM klowey wrote: Hi Kellie1971 and anotherNYCGirl I just got home today (Monday March 19th) from my TUG free flap surgery on Friday March 16th. I had a fabulous plastic surgeon who works in SF and Oakland CA. My surgery has worked out very well so far. I agree with many of the others who strongly recommend a very experienced PS in micro-surgery.
